home.title: Frontend Developer specialized in UI/UX with performance focus
home.subtitle: I transform ideas into exceptional digital experiences, combining intuitive design with optimized code to create products that users truly love to use.
about.title: About me
about.description.first: Hi! I'm Maximiliano, a software developer passionate about building innovative, accessible, and user-centered digital solutions.
about.description.second: My journey in software development began in 2018, when I started creating websites out of curiosity. Since then, I've honed my skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and had the opportunity to work with some of the largest software companies and corporations, contributing to the development of inclusive and functional digital products.
about.description.third: I'm constantly improving my skills and staying up to date with the latest technologies, frameworks, and best practices to build high-quality, scalable, and reliable user experiences.
about.description.fourth: In addition to my development work, I'm also a mentor and educator. I've helped create a comprehensive course covering Next.js, REST APIs, React.js, and Material UIâ€”designed to help others learn by combining theory with real-world application.
about.description.fifth: Lately, I've been diving into the world of AI and exploring how it can enhance software development workflowsâ€”especially large language models (LLMs), agent-based tools, MCP. I believe AI will fundamentally reshape how we design, build, and collaborate in tech.
about.description.sixth: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:
experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: Discover my recent professional journey in this section where I showcase my work experiences and achievements.
experience.tasks.adsmurai.title: Service and technology inspired by digital experts for digital marketing. The headquarters in Barcelona, Spain. Some tasks here:
experience.tasks.adsmurai.one: Conception, development and maintenance of data transformation platform to optimized feeds (digital marketing).
experience.tasks.adsmurai.two: Participated in the design and development of interactive dashboards for multiple clients simultaneously, optimizing key metrics visualization through widgets and charts.
experience.tasks.adsmurai.three: Maintenance and updating of reusable React.js component library, published on npm and used as a base in multiple internal company projects.
experience.tasks.adsmurai.four: Implementation and optimization of React ecosystem using latest Vite versions, improving performance and significantly reducing loading and compilation times in projects.
experience.tasks.adsmurai.five: Participation in recruitment processes for new developers and mentoring them.

chatbot.header.title: Virtual Assistant
chatbot.messages.welcome: Hello! ðŸ‘‹ I am Maximiliano's virtual assistant. How can I help you today?
chatbot.messages.defaultResponse: Thank you for your question. For specific queries, I recommend contacting me directly through my email or LinkedIn. I'm here to help you!
chatbot.quickResponses.label: Frequently asked questions:
chatbot.quickResponses.technologies.ques: What technologies do you work with?
chatbot.quickResponses.technologies.answ: I mainly work with React, Next.js, TypeScript, Material UI, Node.js and databases like PostgreSQL. I also have experience with tools like Vercel, Git, and agile methodologies.
chatbot.quickResponses.resume.question: Can you send me your resume?
chatbot.quickResponses.resume.answer: Of course! You can download my updated resume from the 'Resume' section of my portfolio.
chatbot.quickResponses.experience.answer: I have over 5 years of frontend development experience, working on projects from landing pages to complex web applications. I have worked on both freelance projects and for companies.
chatbot.quickResponses.freelance.answer: Yes, I am available for freelance projects. I specialize in frontend development with React and modern frameworks. You can contact me through my email or LinkedIn to discuss your project.
chatbot.quickResponses.contact.question: How can I contact you?
chatbot.quickResponses.contact.answer: You can contact me through my email: claudioacevedo25@gmail.com or connect with me on LinkedIn. You can also follow me on GitHub to see my latest projects.
